attributes.action: Introduce a bank holiday entitled Celebrate England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A day for England to regain and celebrate being English without feeling ashamed to do so. 
A day when we can celebrate past, present & future heroes from all walks of life.
A day when we can celebrate English achievements.
A day when we can choose a new national anthem that gives us a new English identity for a new era.
And finally a day that makes us proud once again to be English

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
